ProductInfo.Features:
Coby LEDTV3226 32" 720p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV.
Marketing Information: With earth-friendly technology and a sleek minimalist design, Coby's ultra-slim LED TVs are an energy-efficient way to enjoy your favorite shows.
The LEDTV3226 features a brilliant 31.5" widescreen for a premium viewing experience, with digital HDMI connection for crystal-clear picture in vibrant HD.
Multiple inputs and a 15-pin VGA interface allow this set to be used as a television or computer monitor.
Digital noise reduction, film-mode detection, and integrated parental control also included.
